body_html: I can work on this. And I have question here. As boost already provided an EI calculation here. I recommend to just use that and write a wrapper instead of writing it in Python codes. Would you prefer writing pure Python codes for this ops or just use the boost implementation and add a Python wrapper? @josh11b @reedwm
body_text: I can work on this. And I have question here. As boost already provided an EI calculation here. I recommend to just use that and write a wrapper instead of writing it in Python codes. Would you prefer writing pure Python codes for this ops or just use the boost implementation and add a Python wrapper? @josh11b @reedwm
body: I can work on this. And I have question here. As [boost](https://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_48_0/libs/math/doc/sf_and_dist/html/math_toolkit/special/expint/expint_i.html) already provided an EI calculation here. I recommend to just use that and write a wrapper instead of writing it in Python codes. Would you prefer writing pure Python codes for this ops or just use the boost implementation and add a Python wrapper? @josh11b @reedwm
